alert.note: Alert for Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 28 at 1:26PM PDT until March 29 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1 to 2 feet. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Shasta Lake Area / Northern Shasta County and Mountains of Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County, including portions of Interstate 5 north of Redding. * WHEN...Through 11 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels 2000 to 2500 feet, locally down to 1000 feet today. Heaviest snow amounts above 3000 feet.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Mountains Southwestern Shasta County to Western Colusa County; Shasta Lake Area, Northern Shasta County
